attributes.action: lobby Codemasters and Microsoft to hurry up the release of SWOS on Xbox Live Arcade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SWOS was originally due in August 2007 and then was rescheduled to be launched on 19 December 2007.

The game was withdrawn shortly after release much to the frustration of the mass of SWOS fans. There has been little news on a new release timeframe.

We ask the Prime Minister to intervene in this serious matter.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
